website_summaries.verdict: Durable enough to last for years, and a comfortable handle and design as well. This product has nice features for an affordable price.
pros: A durable scoop with stainless steel construction that includes a large top and ergonomic handle available in three colors for easy scooping
Lifetime warranty is hard to beat
cons: Some users complain of issues using this product with extremely hard ice cream right out of the freezer

customer_reviews.title: Worked on deep freezer ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream scoop I have ever owned. I had one from Pampered Chef that was very good, but it was misplaced at a potluck and I couldn't get another. I took a chance on this because of the great reviews. My wife used it first as I insisted she try it to see if it was everything it was reported to be - and she was very impressed. Worked great on deep freezer ice cream. Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: craigspofford

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in a zombie apocalypse
customer_reviews.text: Love this scoop, I bought it for a friend, and I was so jealous, I bought one for myself. It has some good weight to it at almost half a pound. I also love that the tip is a bit tapered, it works well to push ice cream down into a cone. I also suspect that in a zombie apocalypse it would be good for stabbing zombies or gouging eyes. So I guess it could also be used for home security. But mostly ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: BEST SCOOP EVER
customer_reviews.text: After hours of searching and comparing ice cream scoops I chose this one. I am VERY HAPPY with this purchase. It was delivered exactly on time and we immediately washed it so we could try it out. Wish we would've bought it sooner and saved the lives of our spoons ; -) We tried it on 4 different ice creams and it was like scooping whip cream! This scoop is awesome!! Very heavy duty but not too heavy. It has a nice covering that makes it easy to grip especially since I have small hands. Its dishwasher safe and comes with a lifetime warranty!!! This is the only scoop you'll ever need to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R.

customer_reviews.title: Rated the best and you'll see why!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second for myself (can never have enough ice cream!) and since it is such a great a great scoop, I have also gifted it. This is a great price that seems unbelievable since more expensive scoops don't last. This stainless steel scoop is dishwasher safe and very solid. Other scoops are not as solid (they bend) and most are chrome plated that always seem to flake/peel off after several washings. Google "best ice cream scoop" and this one will come in as number one! You can't go wrong with this scoop - very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Devon W. Swihart

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh... it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some glowing reviews I was nearly expecting this to scoop out the ice cream on its own. It works ok. Not experiencing the "slices right through" the ice cream deal. It feels very comfortable in the hand, easy to use, adorable in the pink color, but still needed to heat up the scoop (hot water soak) to make it work with ice cream fresh from the freezer. I don't hate it, but I don't love it either.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one of these a few years ago and it makes scooping ice cream sooo much easier that I bring it along to gatherings at others' homes so that I don't resent having to use their basic scoops. Unfortunately, my family members also really like it, and I'm usually the last one to eat an evening snack, so I often find that the ice cream scoop has dried on ice cream or is in the dirty dishwasher when I go to use it. Training kids and husbandv to hand rinse it wasn't working, so I just bought another to ensure I can always use one of my favorite scoops at night.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Ice Cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the setting on my freezer, but the ice cream (Breyers) in there is hard as a rock. I was scooping it with a spoon and it really was no party, as the ice cream was hard and the end of the spoon dug into my palm. Not very ergonomic. Scooping with the SUMO is a dream. The handle is nice and big so you can get good leverage on the scoop. The Scoop itself is well designed and scoops nicely. The whole thing washes up nicely. Well made, I hope it lasts for many years.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Duck

customer_reviews.title: An ice cream lovers dream!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the ice cream lover in the house and I bought this for him. We have tried several ice cream scoops and the last one quickly started to pit. He hated using it. I started looking for a stainless steel scoop that would not pit or crack and was ergonomically designed. When it came in the mail I surprised my husband with this "gift" and he was immediately thrilled. It works wonderfully for that extra hard ice cream with no strain on your hand while scooping. The blade glides smoothly through the ice cream like hot knife through butter. So glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cope

customer_reviews.title: Wow, the best scooper.
customer_reviews.text: I love ice cream. Like, I have a problem. I've loved ice cream since I was a wee child and I still love it today (okay I'm only 30 but still). I used to have an all metal scooper before this that had sand in it or something that it was supposed to "get warm" while scooping and make scooping easier. Nope. Didn't do anything except exist and was awkward to hold and couldn't scoop for crap. This scooper is the scooper of all scoopers. The handle is so comfortable and easy to grip, and the shape of the scoop makes it easy to cut into ice cream. Get this, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the holy grail of ice cream scoops, but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my scooping technique needs some work, but I find that it's inadequate for ice cream straight out of the freezer. Despite the nicely padded handle, it hurts my wrist trying to scoop cold (and I'm not one with particularly wimpy wrists). Letting the ice cream thaw for a few minutes seems to help -- decently round scoops, and the "pointy" end is convenient for getting ice cream out of the bottom of a pint. But what's the point of a "no-thaw" scoop if I have to let the ice cream thaw?
customer_reviews.author: J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: They named it...the Whale Bopper
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, now THIS is an ice cream scoop. I very rarely use this thing as I'm not an ice cream fan, but my family loves the stuff, and after breaking our Oxo scoop, I ended up picking this one. It's so solid and hefty, my family named it the 'Whale Bopper'...no real idea why, but the name stuck.It hacks through the hardest ice cream better than any other scoop we've owned. It was only last night, when I noticed a name brand scoop which looked sort of similar that I remembered to write a review. I picked up the just-as-expensive name brand scoop, and it was laughable how flimsy it felt compard to this one.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Does not scoop well at all.
customer_reviews.text: This icecream scooper appears sturdy and well made. However it doesn't work very well. In fact a plain old soup spoon does a better job and is easier to hold. This spoon on this one is very heavy and the handle isn't so it is unbalanced and hard to hold. Uncomfortable to use too. You'd better let your icecream soften up a bit first as it does not glide through hard icecream at all. I wouldn't buy it again nor do I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D.Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream?!
customer_reviews.text: This is one heavy-weight spoon! It feels like one solid piece of steal with an ergonomic handle wrapped around one end. I can't imagine how this SUMO Spoon will ever "wear" out... I mean, I'm only scooping ice cream – this thing was obviously made under the assumption that ice cream is made not of frozen milk and sugar, but of solid rock. I'm not typically impressed by simple kitchen utensils, but here we are... impressed! Cuts through ice cream like a warm knife through butter... or ice cream. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Not a Great Scooper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable, very sturdy, but not as good a performer as I expected for the price. Did not easily pierce hard frozen ice cream.Does not make cone or company worthy round balls, but rather feathery curl slices or wedge chunks-- and I have a pretty good wrist technique. Still looking for a solid round scoop, preferably with the release feature. This scoop too narrow and bowl too shallow. Looks good & will outlast me, so I guess I bought a piece of art--form, not function.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Peel

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, scoops the hardest of ice creams with ease!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap ice cream scoop from target because I needed one, and once it went into firm ice scream the scoop bent back like a twig. I ordered this SUMO Ice Cream Scoop because it looks sturdy and had great reviews, and boy were they right! This thing has not failed me once, and I have put it through some rigorous testing, including the thick, heavy cream ice cream I had WAY back near the freezing component in my freezer. Super durable, easily goes through the dishwasher and super comfortable to use, it scoops even the hardest of ice creams with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I don’t review my kitchen stuff much, but this ice cream scoop is amazing! I’ve tried a variety of these and they all came up short. Freezing into the weather ce cream, not scooping well, etc until this one. I took a chance and was so impressed. Easy scoop and release action, does not freeze into the carton and so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream scoop I have found. The solid stainless steel construction means the finish on the scoop won't begin to bubble and flake because there is no finish; it's just metal all the way through. And something about the edges makes scooping ice cream much easier. I ended up buying 3 of them. The cost may seem a little high, but it's worth it because I won't be needing to replace these scoops in a year or two as I have had to do with many other KitchenAid and Cuisinart scoops.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudonymous

customer_reviews.title: Some small dings in the scoop, but it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she's always had to nuke her homemade ice cream to soften it up some. The scoop came with a couple of tiny dings, but she wasn't too concerned about that (will have to keep an eye on it to make sure it doesn't get any worse). Aside from that minor imperfection, the scoop has worked great and is definitely heavy duty to handle the hardest cream. The handle's grip feels good in your hand. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JPTX

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away!
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream scoop we've been using is one left to me by my mom, the one she used for us when we were kids. It has a half moon head with a lever that flips the ice cream out, but the metal is so thick and the lever now stuck: it was never great, but as kids we thought it was better than friends whose mom's had a bent spoon to use for scooping. But today I used this Sumo Scooper, and I was completely blown away! Hard as a rock ice cream comes out effortlessly!! I would totally recommend this ice cream scooper: no more carpal tunnel or painful arthritic thumbs just for a bowl of ice cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great ice cream scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only ice cream scoop you will ever need to buy. I've had to buy scoops repeatedly over the years because they always break, chip, peel, discolor or fail in one way or another. This one is incredible! This is the best quality scoop I've ever seen. It's well made & durable. I don't even have to let the ice cream set out to soften a little. It can go straight from freezer to bowl. I never thought I'd find one this good. And having a choice of colors is nice too. You can't go wrong with this one. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Sumo Ice cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: The scoop is fine heavy and easy to hold. What I really don't like is there was no way to tell if this was made in China or not. It was not in the description. All I noted is that it was from Britain?? I was searching for a USA made product. On the box it says made in CHINA. Not appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: We used to just use our big serving spoons to scoop out ice cream, but they would always get bent out of shape! Decided to “splurge” on this scoop, and it is so worth the money! The handle is made out of a rubber that is soft and provides a good grip. It is very easy too clean and has held up to many many uses. I am pretty positive it will not break anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works just like they say it does!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, when I read that it cuts through ice cream nicely even when frozen hard, I was doubtful. I've had very bad luck with ice cream scoops, and though I've not tried this one myself my husband, who has also gotten frustrated with hard ice cream, says it's wonderful! This is the guy who would get so irritated that he'd beg me to scoop the ice cream for him, but not anymore. I take that as proof.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Truly robust construction and easy to scoop with
customer_reviews.text: After having a few other "metal" ice cream scoops snap off at the thin stem leading to the handle, it's great to finally find a scoop that is solid *thick* metal the entire length. Better yet, the edge of the scoop is sharp enough that I don't have to press down and dig as hard as with previous scoops, making serving much easier. Tip for easiest scooping: since this scoop has a lot of weight from the metal, either let to scoop sit in a cup of hot water or rinse it in hot water long enough for it to warm up. Just as good as "a hot knife though butter"!
customer_reviews.author: Simcha-Yitzchak Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop
customer_reviews.text: The last scoop I had ended up all pitted, hoping over time this one holds up better. It's a nice solid weight and the slighty "pointed" scoop makes it easier to dig out the ice cream. The color is nice and the handle is comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mar W

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best ice cream scoop I've ever used. The sharp point digs right into frozen ice cream and the handle makes it very comfortable to dip as much ice cream as you wish And yes, I bought two of them. They make dipping the hardest ice cream very easy. I recommend this scoop in the color of your choice very highly. I don't think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gillburg

customer_reviews.title: Love this scoop! The only one for me.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new scoop because the one I had started to have metal chips. Love how the SUMO scoop is solid, a nice weight to it. Not light like other Ice cream scoops. I don’t need to take my home made ice cream out early to scoop it. Scoops Ice cream easily. Can’t make a perfect ice cream ball, but work it enough and you can get a over one!
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this about a week, but so far I love it. It's heavy and feels very well-made. It cuts through hard ice cream so easily! If you're looking for an ice cream scoop that makes perfectly spherical scoops, I'm not sure this will be your best bet, but maybe I just haven't mastered that technique with this scoop yet. Honestly I only bought this because other items in my cart were add-on items and I needed to add to my order, but now I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E.

customer_reviews.title: Skip this Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Had my hopes up to finally get a nice scooper. However I felt it to be nearly impossible to scoop anything without having to use my fingers to guide the ice cream into it. The handle is heavy and the tip needs to be wider you need more area to scoop to be able to actually SCOOP. Too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: CC Hustle

customer_reviews.title: Works like it was made for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a relative newbie to home-made ice cream, but I do have a little experience. These containers work great for the final freezing and for keeping the ice cream very fresh! I'm not sure if I managed to stumble onto a really good "fail-proof" recipe this time or if it was my new SUMO containers, but I had no problem with icing or melting. Being kept solidly frozen in these containers, the ice cream maintained excellent quality until it was all gone more than a week after I made it. I'm very pleased and will definitely make more ice cream with more confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Angell

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream lovers — love this scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy we bought this ice cream scoop. We like high quality kitchen tools, and this is sleek, functional, and heavy as desired. We bought this to replace a kitchen aid brand scoop that was getting pitted in its old age — with the “metal finish” starting to flake off. I don’t think this scoop is prone to that kind of aging. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Quality Consumer

customer_reviews.title: FROZEN SOLID ICE CREAM LIKE WHIPPED CREAM
customer_reviews.text: If loving an ice cream scoop is wrong, I don't want to be right. After having it for a little over a week, I heart the Sumo scoop. The handle is comfy yet firm, and the pointed tip really "CUTS THROUGH ROCK-HARD, FROZEN SOLID ICE CREAM LIKE WHIPPED CREAM," as advertised. After vacillating between Sumo and a few others, glad I went with this one (prefer the stainless steel vs aluminum). And the lifetime warranty is sprinkles on the ice cream :) Well done, Sumo.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Face

customer_reviews.title: like many people
customer_reviews.text: We have, like many people, a mix of different ice cream scoops over the years. They bend, they peel and they don't scoop very well. Got the ICS by Sumo in and....works great! Good size grip on the handle. Purple so it stands out in the drawer. Heavy so it makes it easier to scoop. The blade slides easily into the container and a flick of the wrist pops out a smooth scoop. While I wasn't sure I should spend the money on this my choice was vindicated. To borrow from another well know advertising slogan....Just Scoop It!
customer_reviews.author: Battledad

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Cutco Ice Cream Scoop, & a great price!
customer_reviews.text: If you one of the Cutco warriors back in the day (or now) selling Cutco products you know that they make good stuff, but it's REALLY expensive. One of their best products (at the time) was their ice cream scoop that sold for an outrageous price for about $60+ back in 2004. This ice cream scoop works better (because of pointed tip) and only costs about $14. A superior product at a great price. The company also sent me many follow up emails when I purchased this product. Like everyone's said this is an amazing ice cream scoop and this is a MUST HAVE in the kitchen drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: It cuts through hard ice cream nicely and is easy on the wrist and arm
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this scooper when I was a young man. It cuts through hard ice cream nicely and is easy on the wrist and arm. I love this thing! Incidentally, my dog loves licking the cold ice cream off the shiny stainless steel and then it goes right into the dishwasher.No, not the dog silly, the scooper goes into the dishwasher.My cat, on the other hand, loves the dishwasher and cats normally don't like water.The short cycle is a definite must though and Harvey comes out smelling like a rose.So there you have it.We love all you wonderful people.Ciao,Me
customer_reviews.author: Ode Fot

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, solid ice cream scoop. The handle is just the right size and it has a great grip. The top tapers which makes it really easy to cut through rock-hard ice cream. I like the fact that it is dishwasher safe - however after reading some reviews that say water can get trapped in the handle, I think I'll just hand wash. If you're looking for perfectly rounded scoops of ice cream, there might be a better choice for you. But if you're looking for a sturdy, ergonomic scoop that can take on the hardest ice cream, this is a perfect choice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Performance did not match the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The scoop seems to be well made & sturdy. But it performed as well as my $4.00 Kitchen-aid scoop from Ross's. I liked the boxing, but scooping frozen ice cream required as much effort as the Kitchen-aid. I was disappointed based on the reviews that I had read. I ordered a Fruzen scoop & just got it. I will be testing this one out, hoping that this works better. All three designs look similar, but the Fruzen looks like it should function more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Awareness

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive ice cream scoop. It has a really nice weight to it and feels really good in the hand. It glides right through hard ice cream without the slightest feeling of wobble in the handle - it's really sturdy. It's been through the dishwasher a few times and came out looking great. Time will tell if it will pit like a few scoops that I've had in the past, but I really don't think this is going to. Seems to be a quality stainless. I think this is a scoop that I'll have for years to come. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JustLisa2U

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Cream Scoop Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I finally wore out my trusty ice cream scoop and decided to look around for a new one. I decided to try the Sumo scoop and I’m really glad I did. It’s well made, comfortable in my hand, dishwasher safe, and best of all it’s strong and doesn’t bend in hard ice cream. The colors are great too. I ended up ordering 2 more in different colors so there’s always a clean one available.
customer_reviews.author: C. Slasor

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: The only ice cream scoop my family has ever had tended to cling to the ice cream, and it broke within a year or so. It wasn't very impressive, so since then we have always used soup spoons to dish up ice cream, resulting in a lot of bent-up silverware. This SUMO scoop is definitely in a higher league than that inexpensive scoop. I didn't know using a nice ice cream scoop would make scooping the ice cream so much easier. No longer will we need to strain our wrists, try different angles, or wait for the ice cream to soften. Sadly, it's too late for the poor soup spoons.
customer_reviews.author: February

customer_reviews.title: Nice scoop that is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scoop. It works well for filling cake cones - our primary ice cream treat. Easy to clean and hold. Replaced a rusting, coated scooper. Comes in a nice product box for gifting. We are happy and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend $13 on an ice cream scoop, but anything else would have been a waste compared to this. Dont buy a cheaper product, it won't last and you will be mad. Skip starbucks for a few days and get this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beltrame

customer_reviews.title: What a scoop
customer_reviews.text: Buying this ice cream scoop was an easy decision. Tons of rave reviews and great price. My wife destroyed her old one with the mechanical arm. This one will last a long time and had nothing to break on it. Dip in warm water and the ice creme is easy to place into the bowl/cup.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to dip into frozen rock solid ice cream
customer_reviews.text: It was important to have an ice cream dipper that would easily cut right into frozen ice cream. I have always used the ice cream scooper that is round with the little handle . It was always a struggle scooping into hard frozen ice cream. The only thing I miss is not having round scoops. I still love this great SUMO ice cream dipper no more struggles!
customer_reviews.author: VJ Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I would buy again. Bought one for son’s family and one for our house. Nothing better than a cone as my grandchildren agree. Left scoop, cones and ice cream to have while we are away this winter. Every bite of ice cream will help to remind them of us while gone this winter. The scoops work well.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooper for hard ice cream
customer_reviews.text: We store our ice cream in a deep chest freezer, which hardens them significantly. We've used many other types of scoopers, which either bend or don't cut into the ice cream. This scooper has a good ergonomic feel and heavier weight that allows is to carve through hard ice cream with much less effort. If you have a hard ice cream problem, this is your solution!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This little scoop is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Really works. I received one of these as a gift and have given several as gifts. Everyone is amazed how well this works. No more softening ice cream in advance, defrosting a little in the microwave before scooping or even dipping the scoop in warm water. This handy dandy little scoop cuts right through hard frozen ice cream with ease. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: roseann8628

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would review an ice cream scoop, but here it is. This scoop is one of the best scoops that I have used. One of the things I like the most is the heft of it. You can tell it's quality just based on the weight of it. The scooping end is more elliptical than circular and makes it easier to cut into the ice cream. It washes easily, thought I prefer to hand wash it over the dish washer. I would definitely recommend this if you are an ice cream aficionado.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ice cream scooper
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ice cream scooper. Super ergonomic. Feel heavy in your hand, not flimsy. Well made. No more using spoons to scoop the ice cream. Love this scooper so much! You will not regret making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonKing

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, easy to use and wash, looks great. Nice handle. So I grant it 5 stars. NOW for the one bad thing, not only this product but almost every non Amazon directly sold product now comes with a stream of harassment to give your review, 5 star of course. In this case they deserve it, but I just don't appreciate getting all these emails. I especially don't like the vendors who bribe you for a good review and we all know this happens a lot. Don't complain will give you back your money if you don't pan us!
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

customer_reviews.title: Well made scoop (haven't had it long).
customer_reviews.text: The heft of the scoop reinforces the claim that it is pure stainless steel (even through the handle). That and the thickness of the neck is good for durability (narrow necked scoops or scoops with a metal piece mounted on a fully plastic handle aren't worth the materials they're made with). The scoop has a slight edge and point to aid scooping firmer ice creams. Time will reveal its true durability, but it seems like a great scoop for the price as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Won't break!
customer_reviews.text: Super solid, hasn't bent at all even after hammering on the back of it with my hand to get through rock solid ice cream! Many dishwasher washing and no tarnish or wear, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Works great on even hard ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best ice cream scoop ever. Are used it on very hard ice cream and it cut right through it. It’s new so I don’t know how it will hold up. But it seems very well-made. Went right in the dishwasher. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good scooper since my niece accidentally bent ours, this is definitely heavy duty. Dad approved since we always have him do the hard work especially when it comes to scooping really frozen ice cream! Highly recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old pamper chef scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I will ever buy a different brand of ice cream scoop. I bought this as a gift for my mother in law who just loves ice cream, but she was using a big flimsy spoon. I bought this for her, in purple(her favorite color), and she LOVES IT. The sharp point cuts through the ice cream like a hot knife through butter, its heavy duty...but its dishwasher safe which is amazing! It's also easy enough to clean by hand. If you have been searching for an ice cream scoop, just do yourself a favor and add this to your cart. You wont ve disappointed, we definitely aren't! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ellise

customer_reviews.title: Hefty and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome ice cream scoop! The heft of it tells you as soon as you pick it up that it isn't going to have any trouble plowing through the hardest ice cream. And, sure enough, it didn't disappoint! Unfortunately that means I'll have to be eating more ice cream. Oh well, somebody has to do it, right?
customer_reviews.author: P. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s that good!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had two different designs of Pampered Chef scoops and they both suddenly started leaving metallic gray streaks in my beautiful ice cream. Not to mention they just didn’t scoop all that great. I figured there had to be a better scoop out there. Amazon did not fail me. This is the ice cream scoop to beat them all. I wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: K. Slaback

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! No more hand cramping from attempting to scoop hardened ice cream. This is a must-have item especially if you like to make homemade ice cream all the time.
customer_reviews.author: sirius1nWA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made as advertised. I narrowed the leading edge and polished the front 3/8 portion to slice through. It did help, not a knife edge, just thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter 60

customer_reviews.title: Real Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It's nice to get something well made these days. Excellent handle for my old hands digging out that delicious frozen custard:0) The only down side is it's excellent for my wife digging out that delicious frozen custard:( Buy it and you'll be happy everytime you use it.
customer_reviews.author: MERTMAG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best Ice cream scooper I have ever used!!! It is heavy, sharp and does an amazing job! I bought another after our first, now have 2!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent scoop. It will break through a plastic container and remain intact (as I discovered when I attempted to scoop rock hard frozen yogurt).
customer_reviews.author: Kathi M.

customer_reviews.title: A very good scoop
customer_reviews.text: Not a steel like coating, but real steel. Works very well and cleans very well. The scoop size is smaller than some others, but I am still very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Product came much sooner than I expected! It is compact and strong, yet so easy to handle and scoop! Very easy to clean. So glad I made this purchase - my other scoop kept getting powdery calcifications on it, no matter how quickly I washed and dried it.......I am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: danceswithowls

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sharp enough to cut through hard frozen icecream
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, easy to scoop ice-cream as it is heavy and sharp edged. No more sprained arms from trying to scoop hard frozen ice-cream!"
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ice cream scoop!
customer_reviews.text: We have both the green and blue handled SUMO ice cream scoops. Love them! We have tried three other types of scoops, all of which either broke with time, did not scoop well, or did not hold up in the dishwasher. These scoops, however, are exactly as advertised. Scooping out ice cream is no longer a chore, and we don't have to remember to set the ice cream carton out a few minutes to thaw prior to serving.
customer_reviews.author: KinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's all I had hoped ! 😃 I wanted something that would last and last and I think I have found what I am looking for in an ice cream scoop. I had bought a heavy, solid metal scoop prior, but unlike this one it had the fake chrome on the metal part which started to peel after some years. I don't want to feed my family that ! I don't forsee any issues with this one .
customer_reviews.author: Rose54909

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Have had many ice cream scoops over the years, this is the best hand down, great weight, perfectly designed scoop with shape designed to carve into the hardest ice cream, a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye to all previous ice cream scoopers. The scooper has good grip, is solid, and digs right into a frozen gallon of ice cream with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: MissMissy

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, not likely to bend at the neck like previous scoops we've gotten locally at the store, hefty in the hand, comfortable to grip, and seems to be just the right curvature to convince ice cream to curl obediently when very little pressure is applied.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: super sturdy scooper
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hefty feel of the sumo scoop. I feel it will not break like my other-brand scoop did. I had no problem putting it through the dishwasher, scoop side down like the directions say. The grip fits my hand very nicely and I'll be able to get every last molecule of my favorite mint chocolate chip... yum!
customer_reviews.author: ASF

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly formed scoops
customer_reviews.text: A great scoop. I make ice cream all the time. And buy a lot of it too. I pride myself on handing my 3 year old daughter a perfectly formed ice cream cone. Which sounds silly now that I’m typing it. I may have other issues in life. However if you’re like me and you want your ice cream to look as good as it tastes, get this scoop. The color choices are pretty rad too. My wife wanted blue, so that’s what we got!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scoop.  You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We toyed with the idea of buying a new scoop that had the swing lever, but after reading some of the reviews of the SUMO scoop we decided to try it. I was surprised at how easily this scoop ploughs through the hard ice cream. Pleasantly surprised.. I heartily recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved this scoop so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match the rest of the party decorations and table settings for my daughter's birthday party. We loved this scoop so much, we got rid of our old one. The handle is sturdy and ergonomic, and the scoop easily slides through even ice cream that's frozen hard.
customer_reviews.author: emme

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scooper I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: Great stainless steel ice cream scooper with a soft ergonomic grip. It has a brushed finish which is fine but I would've probably preferred it to be polished to a mirror like finish. Nonetheless it the best scooper I've seen. It is a bit nose heavy but that's not much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop has been very handy for homemade ice cream scooping. It creates a nicely round scoop of ice cream with little effort. Haven't had to deal with extra hard ice cream, but it has a nice weighted handle and sturdy construction and seems like it would be up for the job.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice heft to it. The edge feels "sharp" making it easy to cut into the ice cream and scoop. Overall excellent. Only slight complaint is that it is a tad heavy and the grip is perfectly comfortable and functional, but doesn't quite feel like it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Brin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews; although I read them all the time when making buying decisions. I read several reviews before making a decision to purchase this ice cream scoop. No regrets, it is study, great quality and performs excellent. No problems scooping hard ice cream. I have put it through the dishwasher several times and comes out looking brand new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use. However, it a little wide on the handle. Other than that, the ice cream comes out easy from the container.
customer_reviews.author: Dondon

customer_reviews.title: A fine scooper indeed
customer_reviews.text: I think all utensils, cups, plates, and insulated coffee mugs should be 'dishwasher safe' Thankfully this highly effective scooper is.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: SOLID STAINLESS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream scoop EVER! It is truly 100% stainless not plated! Very heavy and solid. I've had it for over a year now and I can honestly say it'll probably last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: I'm fairly certain this scoop was tempered with sorcery
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea it could be so easy to scoop hard frozen ice cream, and I rue that it's taken me so long in life to discover SUMO. Also, it's heavy, which means it does most of the work for you. Keep your Grandpa's old scoop in the back of that one kitchen drawer. You know the one I mean, with the weird rolling pin you never use but can't bring yourself to get rid of, and that egg slicer thing with the wires...I promise you'll get excited about ice cream again.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this ice cream scoop. It is heavy enough to be effective. It was easy to use and I would buy it again should we ever need another.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in some sort of food service for the last 30 years and I absolutely love this thing! Tuff as nails! SOLID! It’s stainless so its not gonna grey out on ya. Great scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Borst

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This scoop has a very ergonomic design, and I love the purple color. It also scoops hard ice cream quite easily; however, for the life of me I can't get mine to come out nicely in a circle, which I thought this scoop was supposed to do. Nonetheless, it does the job of scooping frozen ice cream well.
customer_reviews.author: Merrilee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice cream scoop! As soon as I picked it up I knew it was a winner! Nice and heavy! Easy to hold too!
customer_reviews.author: Atattooedbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing plows through coconut milk & almond milk ice cream, which happens to freeze spoon-bendingly rock solid in our freezer. This is the kind of scoop that will last for years. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to scoop out ice cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the most wonderful ice cream scoop I have ever had! It’s design is easy to manage when scooping out ice cream. I broke my wrist, and I can still get a full scoop easily. I do run the scoop under hot water before scooping. Now I enjoy serving ice cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Berning

customer_reviews.title: wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife after constant complaints about our ice cream scoop which was eventually broken during a party. She'd expressed "scoop envy" at her parent's house about their scoop but they couldn't remember where they bought it years ago. Well, now she's 100% happy with the purchase. I'd normally not write a review for something like this but the company seems to really love their product and they seem to stand behind it so I might as well sing their graces as well.
customer_reviews.author: nerdtrader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent commercial ice cream scoopers!
customer_reviews.text: We are Ice cream festival vendor and food these to be top notch! Best we food to date and the price is great! I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: This works great to scoop solid ice cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid ice cream scoop. Solid and a bit heavy. This works great to scoop solid ice cream. The shape of the scoop is nice because you can get to the edges/corners of the ice cream container. I'd recommend washing with the scoop DOWN since I did have water accumulate in between the rubber handle and metal shaft when I washed it the other way.
customer_reviews.author: BagLady

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop yet.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Best scoop I have used yet. Cuts through even the most hardest of ice creams. the handle is very slip resistant and comfortable. I HIGHLY recommend this product. Also, i have seen several people say that after washing it in dishwasher it is discolored. It specifically states wash by hand. So wash it by hand. it isn't that hard folks.
customer_reviews.author: Hood

customer_reviews.title: It could have been lesser in price
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and I pray it lasts. With the few handles so it sometimes I feel it won't
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Aba Wiredu

customer_reviews.title: Great design and extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy scoop. I haven't seen anything of this quality and strength in over 30 years. Well worth the price and will last a lifetime in my opinion. I got this to go with the ice cream storage units they make. The point on the end is a much better design than the rounded ones as it helps to get the ice cream started into the scoop.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Ice Cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived sooner than expected and was exactly as advertised. The ice cream scoop is heavy and seems to be a good quality. It works well so far. This is the second item I have purchased from this company.
customer_reviews.author: rkprince

customer_reviews.title: Great Use Crean Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Really like this scoop. It is easy to clean. Scoops out ice cream even when it is very cold and hard or soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Cool Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Best scoop I have ever owned. It's heavy and able to get through the hardest ice cream, even the diabetic ice cream Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O.

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop
customer_reviews.text: Good size handle allows for easy of leverage to make nice round scoops. Heavy duty for long lasting durability. Easy to clean up. what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big handle
customer_reviews.text: Nice pointy tip to ease digging into hard ice cream. Appears to be well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Handles hard frozen ice cream with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Well made scoop. Handles hard frozen ice cream with ease. Nice looking and it doesn’t have that chrome plating that eventually flakes.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. B.

product_meta.title: SUMO Ice Cream Scooper: Solid Stainless Steel Scoop. Dishwasher Safe (Red)
feature_bullets: THE INDESTRUCTIBLE SCOOPER: Kiss those snapped scoops and bent spoons goodbye forever. The ultra-strong SUMO stainless steel scoop is the last icecream scooper you'll ever buy. Enjoy your pure metal scoop forever without scratches, chips, bends, or breaks.

DESSERT TIME, ANY TIME: No more setting your ice cream out to soften. Instead, savor your favorite flavors any time your cravings strike with your SUMO scoop. What makes it the best ice cream scoop ever? The chiseled tip slices straight through even the hardest ice cream with ease.

NO SLIP, NO STRAIN, NO PAIN: Tired of ice cream spoon handles that bend under pressure and leave you with aching wrists? Then, make the switch to SUMO. Dip into your frozen dairy treats effortlessly and without pain thanks to our ergonomic design and comfy, squishy-yet-grippy rubber handle

TASTY and TRUSTWORTHY: SUMO never sacrifices the quality of our ice cream accessories. Your completely dishwasher-friendly metal ice cream scoop is 100% BPA free, made from pure stainless steel, and features a handle coated in premium food-grade rubber. Now, that's delicious.

SATISFACTION WITH EVERY SCOOP: We've stood the (taste) test of time: Not one SUMO ice cream spade has ever broken. It's safe to say we know you'll be satisfied. Even still, we cover your purchase with our Lifetime Warranty. Don't love yours? Let us know, and we'll replace it for free.
